name: Curse
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You curse a target creature or an object that isn't being carried or worn. A cursed creature must make an Intuition saving throw to avoid the effect. A cursed object has no effect until a creature picks it up, where it becomes impossible to remove from the creature's hand and bestows its effects onto the creature.

When a target is cursed, choose one of the following effects:
One stat you choose is decreased by 2.
Three stats you choose are decreased by 1.
The creature takes 1d6 unholy damage each time it makes an attack roll.
The creature has disadvantage on saving throws with a chosen stat.
The creature loses 1 AP at the start of each of its turns.

The curse on a creature ends if the creature is reduced to 0 or fewer hit points.
empower: If cast directly on a creature, you can choose two effects. If cast on an object, the duration becomes "Until dispelled".
